segments.text: Jane ! What an enchanting skirt you have on !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you ! Guess how much it costs .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Bright colors , smooth material , exquisite craftsmanship , soft lines ... Darling , it looks elegant on you ! It can't be any cheap stuff . Something around two hundred , I guess .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your offer is way off the mark . It set me back only sixty-five .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then you got a windfall ! Was sixty-five the original price , or did you get a special discount ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Neither . I drove a hard bargain with the vendor before I got the price down .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How much did she ask for ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Three hundred ! That's daylight robbery . How dare she play tricks on an old hand like me ? Without hesitation , I gave my offer---no more than fifty .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She must be fuming with anger at such a bid , wasn't she ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not at all ! She's really been around , and seemed quite accustomed to bargaining like this . That's the trade . She only demanded a higher bid , saying the purchase price was even higher than seventy . She was lying ! Then I inquired , ' May I have it at sixty ? ' she waved her head .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then you pretended to go without buying it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . I turned around and started to move out . Just then , she yelped behind my back , ' all right , all right ! I may sacrifice a little . Let's fix it sixty-five ! Can't be cheaper . '
segments.speaker: S2
